snippet: Asparagus heralds the start of the season’s crops in New Jersey, and sellers are seeing more demand from customers and recognition for the state’s product.
abstract: Asparagus heralds the start of the season’s crops in New Jersey, and sellers are seeing more demand from customers and recognition for the state’s product (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Asparagus heralds the start of the season’s crops in New Jersey, and sellers are seeing more demand from customers and recognition for the state’s product.

headline.seo: In New Jersey, Asparagus Takes Its Place at the Table
headline.main: It’s No Tomato, but a Stalk Gets Some Respect
